meanings.definition: The act of stinging or causing a rash
meanings.sent1: After walking through the tall grass, she experienced painful urtications on her legs.
meanings.sent2: The urtications from the insect bite left red welts on his skin.
meanings.sent3: The urtications from the poison ivy made him regret his decision to explore the forest without long pants.
meanings.sent4: The urtications of betrayal felt like a thousand tiny needles piercing his heart.
meanings.sent5: The urtications of the jellyfish sting were seared into her memory.

meanings.definition: A sensation of itching or burning in the skin
meanings.sent1: The allergic reaction caused intense urtications all over her body.
meanings.sent2: The urtications from the sunburn made him squirm uncomfortably in his seat.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected urtications on his arm made him scratch like a dog with fleas.
meanings.sent4: The urtications of guilt crawled under her skin, making her restless.
meanings.sent5: The urtications of anticipation before the roller coaster ride were almost unbearable.
